message: I'm offering you a great deal on a high-quality product, but I'll throw in a low-quality one as a 'bonus' if you buy now. It's a one-time offer, and I'm only doing this because I really need to move some inventory. The total price is $10000, and I'm confident you'll be happy with the value you receive.
I'm not interested in the 'bonus' low-quality product, and I'm not willing to pay $10000 for a single high-quality product. I'd like to wait and see what the next product is.
